review: At its new reduced price (cheaper than Roku 3) the Apple TV remains a great option, assuming you are a Mac, iPhone or iPad user.While other devices have more channels and its channel interfaces are a bit dated, a few things make this a killer app:1) So many native iOS apps support AirPlay. So while a Roku may have more native channels, the Apple TV can stream anything. IF you have other Apple products.2) The video and audio streaming (AirPlay) is fantastic. There are churches using these in lieu of expensive HDMI extenders. Works great! They are also showing up in board rooms, which beats having to sit in the right place and hoping you remembered your VGA dongle for the projector.
